LanguageData.VGE_GravtechConsole.label: gravtech console
LanguageData.VGE_GravtechConsole.description: An interface used to analyze gravdata gathered from gravship launches and travel. It draws power directly from the grav engine.
LanguageData.VGE_GravshipBlackBox.label: gravship black box
LanguageData.VGE_GravshipBlackBox.description: An indestructible advanced recorder integrated into the gravship’s systems. It greatly increases gravdata yield, captures any overflow that would normally be wasted, and allows stored gravdata to be converted directly into research points. A gravship can support only one black box.
LanguageData.VGE_FlightComputer.label: flight computer
LanguageData.VGE_FlightComputer.description: An advanced computational unit that optimizes data collection during gravship travel. Increases the amount of gravdata gained from each launch.
